backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, user/profile maps, posts, ponds, ribbits, likes, activities, and tag stats, plus related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root element and loading the frontend entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global theme provider, and all application route definitions.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component that uses bookmark state to mark or unmark a lily.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with navigation links and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, mobile menu toggle, user avatar, and create actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout composing Header, Footer, route outlet, and mobile sidebar drawer with auto-close on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar showing main routes and recent activities with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with metadata, image handling, counts, liking, sharing, and optional user avatars.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with body scroll locking and slide-in animation.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a ribbit reply thread item with nesting, likes, avatar, timestamp, and reply form.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts using fetched pond and lily data with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on query input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Inline dropdown offering trending searches or suggestions depending on the current search query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags using tag statistics, with modular sections and loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab lists and triggers with underline-themed classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs in localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query matches the current viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for ponds, membership, profiles, and mutations using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode tokens, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and returns errors for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and returns errors for alphanumeric tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily view cooldown tracking in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing the platform, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, membership indicators, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new lily with support for text, images, links, tags, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating ponds with validation, image uploads, compression, and preview handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for creating posts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main lily feed with sorting, search results, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with details, ribbits, likes, views, and interaction features.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond details including moderators, visibility, and creation date, with loading states and ability to leave the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with lilies, join controls, sorting, and sidebars, handling loading and non‑existent ponds.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists user‑bookmarked lilies stored locally, loading each lily and allowing removal of unavailable items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation, using tabs and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows lilies for a specific tag with sorting and canonical‑tag redirection, plus sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings such as username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, admin tools, and joined‑pond management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, animations, container settings, and plugins for animation and typography.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing image compression features, and pending feature requests for client-side image compression.
